lt4:nrccMessages.lt:message: Major disruption to / from London Paddington due to a damage to the overhead electric wires. Trains may be cancelled or severely delayed by at least 90 minutes. More details can be found in Latest Travel News.
Due to heavy rain flooding the railway between Plymouth and Exeter St Davids trains may be cancelled, delayed or revised. More details can be found in Latest Travel News.

lt7:service.lt4:cancelReason: This train has been cancelled because of industrial action
This train has been cancelled because of industrial action
